article_title: City fire burns tenant; displaces college students

article_metadata.author: SUZANNE MOORE News EditorPress-Republican

og.description: PLATTSBURGH — Climbing through the third-floor window of the burning eight-unit house, Firefighter Matt Barrett couldn’t see the woman he knew was there somewhere.
